title: 348 - 3 Exercises for Finding Your Way Back to the Heart of Your Creative Path
description:
__________

SPONSORS

STORYBLOCKS
Video is one of my most effective ways to stand out as a creator online these days - and with Storyblocks you can take your videos to the next level - with Affordable Subscriptions, Unlimited Downloads, and 1M+ Royalty Free Assets - you can level up your content at storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk

SKILLSHARE
There’s nothing better than getting better. Accomplishing growth is extremely satisfying, and online classes from Skillshare make it possible. Learn about illustration, design, photography, productivity, and marketing. With Skillshare’s short classes, you can move your creative journey forward without putting life on hold. So explore your creativity at Skillshare.com/CreativePep where our listeners get a free trial of Premium Membership.

itunes:title: 348 - 3 Exercises for Finding Your Way Back to the Heart of Your Creative Path
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Think back to a time in your creative journey where you felt right on the heels of your potential and you knew the exact way to spend your energy.

Pretty much all of us have been thrown off this path at this point. 

In this episode I want to share with you 3 specific exercises that have helped me re-spark my passion for my creative journey and awakened decisive direction and excited action again!

In this episode we dive into:- Why getting lost is part of the process and therefore what skill we need to master- A tool for seeing the essential things you uniquely need in your everyday- The opposite of a New Years resolution and how it creates the environment for reaching your most important goals
